Sample Makecode  Arcade extension

# Example Usage

1. Create a new project at https://arcade.makecode.com
2. Add new extension for QR Code [https://github.com/Grant-Archibald-MS/pxt-qrcode](https://github.com/Grant-Archibald-MS/pxt-qrcode)
3. Change to javascrit view and add the following sample code

```javascript
let qrCode = QRCode.create("https://arcade.makecode.com", 2)
scene.setBackgroundImage(img`
```
